entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Drizzle and Fog, 4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangirsuk Airport 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
Condition: Heavy Drizzle and Fog
Temperature: 4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 4.6°C
Wind: ESE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending overnight then cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 then light this evening. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
